verses.verse: Come <S%H7126>near,<s%> you <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear!<s%> <S%H7181>Listen,<s%> you <S%H3816>peoples.<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> and all it <S%H4393>contains<s%> <S%H8085>hear;<s%> the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and everything that comes from <S%H6631>it.<s%>

For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is <S%H7110>enraged<s%> against all the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and <S%H2534>angry<s%> with all their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> He has utterly <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> <S%H5414>them.<s%> He has given them over for <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>

Their <S%H2491>slain<s%> will also be cast <S%H7993>out,<s%> and the <S%H889>stench<s%> of their dead <S%H6297>bodies<s%> will come <S%H5927>up;<s%> and the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will <S%H4549>melt<s%> in their <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

All of the <S%H6635>army<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky<s%> will be <S%H4743>dissolved.<s%> The <S%H8064>sky<s%> will be rolled <S%H1556>up<s%> like a <S%H5612>scroll,<s%> and all its <S%H6635>armies<s%> will fade <S%H5034>away,<s%> as a <S%H5929>leaf<s%> fades from <S%H5034>off<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H5034>or<s%> a fig <S%H8384>tree.<s%>

For my <S%H2719>sword<s%> has <S%H7301>drunk<s%> its fill in the <S%H8064>sky.<s%> <S%H3381>Behold,<s%> it will come down on <S%H123>Edom,<s%> and on the <S%H5971>people<s%> of my <S%H2764>curse,<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%>

<S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood.<s%> It is <S%H2459>covered<s%> with <S%H1878>fat,<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> with the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H352>rams;<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> And a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom.<s%>

The wild <S%H7214>oxen<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> with <S%H6499>them,<s%> and the young bulls with the mighty <S%H47>bulls;<s%> and their <S%H776>land<s%> will be <S%H7301>drunken<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> and their <S%H6083>dust<s%> made <S%H1878>greasy<s%> with <S%H2459>fat.<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7966>recompense<s%> for the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

Its <S%H5158>streams<s%> will be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H2203>pitch,<s%> its <S%H6083>dust<s%> into <S%H1614>sulfur,<s%> And its <S%H776>land<s%> will become <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H2203>pitch.<s%>

It <S%H3518>won't<s%> be quenched <S%H3915>night<s%> nor <S%H3119>day.<s%> Its <S%H6227>smoke<s%> will go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5769>forever.<s%> From <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation,<s%> it will lie <S%H2717>waste.<s%> No one will pass <S%H5674>through<s%> it <S%H5331>forever<s%> and <S%H5331>ever.<s%>

But the <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and the <S%H7090>porcupine<s%> will <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H3244>it.<s%> The owl and the <S%H6158>raven<s%> will <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H5186>it.<s%> He will stretch the <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H8414>confusion<s%> over <S%H6957>it,<s%> and the plumb line of <S%H922>emptiness.<s%>
They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> its <S%H2715>nobles<s%> to the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> but none shall be <S%H8269>there;<s%> and all its princes shall be <S%H657>nothing.<s%>

<S%H5518>Thorns<s%> will come <S%H5927>up<s%> in its <S%H759>palaces,<s%> <S%H7057>nettles<s%> and <S%H2336>thistles<s%> in its <S%H4013>fortresses;<s%> and it will be a <S%H5116>habitation<s%> of <S%H8577>jackals,<s%> a <S%H2681>court<s%> for <S%H1323>ostriches.<s%>

The wild animals of the <S%H6728>desert<s%> will <S%H6298>meet<s%> with the <S%H338>wolves,<s%> and the wild <S%H8163>goat<s%> will <S%H7121>cry<s%> to his <S%H7453>fellow.<s%> <S%H3917>Yes,<s%> the night creature shall <S%H7280>settle<s%> <S%H4672>there,<s%> and shall find herself a place of <S%H4494>rest.<s%>

The arrow <S%H7091>snake<s%> will make her <S%H7077>nest<s%> <S%H4422>there,<s%> and lay, <S%H1234>hatch,<s%> and <S%H1716>gather<s%> under her <S%H6738>shade.<s%> <S%H1772>Yes,<s%> the kites will be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H802>there,<s%> every one with her <S%H7468>mate.<s%>

Search <S%H1875>in<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7121>read:<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>these<s%> will be <S%H5737>missing.<s%> <S%H802>none<s%> will <S%H6485>lack<s%> her <S%H7468>mate.<s%> For my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> and his <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> has gathered <S%H6908>them.<s%>

He has <S%H5307>cast<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for <S%H3027>them,<s%> and his hand has <S%H2505>divided<s%> it to them with a measuring <S%H6957>line.<s%> They shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it <S%H5769>forever.<s%> <S%H5704><s%> From <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> they will dwell in <S%H7931>it.<s%>
